I DO AGREE! I JUST WANT YOU TO ADMIT THAT OPTIMUS
PRIMAL WAS REFORMATTED, BUT NEVER ACTUALLY DID MUCH
AFTER THAT EXCEPT STARTING A VERY MINOR RELIGION NOW
KNOWN AS THE MALACONS! DO I NEED TO BRING HIM TO
EARTH!

--- Vincent Price <thecode@...> wrote:
> OOC: Well, I'm threw talking to an idiot like you,
> Dewboy, you obviously think that you own this RPG.
> Nevertheless, Beast Machines never happened, I'm
> glad you agree...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Kyle Stewart 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>   Subject: Re: Optimus Fury

> AND
